title: DeepAnT
authors: Mohsin Munir and Shoaib Ahmed Siddiqui and Andreas Dengel and Sheraz Ahmed

parameters.name: window_size
parameters.description: History window: Number of time stamps in history, which are taken into account

parameters.description: If 1 - (loss / last_loss) is less than `delta` for `patience` epochs, stop

parameters.description: If 1 - (loss / last_loss) is less than `delta` for `patience` epochs, stop

parameters.name: window_size
parameters.description: History window that was used for the model training
